name: ZION (DEVKARA)
description:
Zion is an Action game, acting as Zion to fight enemies, besides that there are also several obstacles that must be faced. A kind-hearted robot who has a brother. One day Zion older brother was kidnapped by a group of evil robots. Inevitably Zion must save his brother from danger, fight evil enemies and destroy them!
